description: This file defines the AdminOrdersManagementScreen widget, a Flutter screen used in the admin panel for managing orders. It includes layout for headers, placeholders for order data, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the admin orders management page, displaying headers, placeholders, and responsive layout.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A widget for rendering styled section headers with icons, titles, and subtitles.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A decorative placeholder widget representing future content such as tables or lists.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the orders management screen, including header, placeholders, and responsive layout.

methods.name: _NeonSectionHeader.build
methods.description: Constructs the header card with gradient, icon, title, and subtitle.

methods.name: _NeonPlaceholder.build
methods.description: Creates a neon-glow styled container with an icon and descriptive text.
